title: The Little Hairs
itunes:title: The Little Hairs
description:
Good evening and welcome to Nighty Night with Rabia Chaudry: Bedtime stories to keep you awake. Tonight's tale is about a woman who forgot the golden rule of survival: When it comes to strangers, being polite can be deadly. Please enjoy...The Little Hairs.

Tonight's tale is written by Sarah Cailean.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
